entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
